project_descr: ENABLING ACTIVITIES FOR THE PREPARATION OF SURINAME’S SECOND NATIONAL COMMUNCIATION TO THE UNITED NATIONS FRAMEWORK CONVENTION ON CLIMATE CHANGE; PIMS #3537 CC EA SNC of Suriname

outputs.output_descr: Enable Suriname to prepare its Second National Communication to the Conference of the Parties to the UNFCCC and contribute to formulation of national policy and planning on Climate Change.
